Subject: Re: whoisvisiting

[EXTERNAL] This email came from outside Acoufelt. Don't click links or open files unless you trust the sender.
Hi Ben,

Sure, it can’t hurt and the cost is a fairly low barrier.

The biggest advantages from systems like these occurs when there is a solid sales process that defines the ‘what' and ‘how' we will use this information. That’s when we can truly benefit and measure an ROI from the additional cost, but also our time spent in analysis etc.

It will be an interesting process taking the information and contacting the company in an effective and non-intrusive manner as they haven’t consented during the process.

Hope that helps?

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

<https://wolfiq.com.au/>
